Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
A service responsible for handling user-related operations.

Provides methods for getting user, editing user, and managing saved-school

  • Method Details

    • getUserByUsername

      UserResponse getUserByUsername(String username)
      Get a user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user
      Returns:
      a response object containing user information
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user with username is not found
      See Also:
      • UserResponse

    • editUser

      UserResponse editUser(Long userId, EditUserRequest editUserRequest)
      Edit a user's profile.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      editUserRequest - request object containing data required to edit profile
      Returns:
      a response object containing edited user information
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user with userId is not found
      See Also:
      • EditUserRequest
      • UserResponse

    • editUserRole

      UserResponse editUserRole(Long userId, EditUserRoleRequest editUserRoleRequest)
      Edit a user's role.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      editUserRoleRequest - request object containing data required to edit role
      Returns:
      a response object containing edited user information
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user with userId is not found
      LastAdminException - if user is the last admin and is demoting to user
      See Also:
      • EditUserRoleRequest
      • UserResponse

    • getSavedSchoolIds

      SavedSchoolResponse getSavedSchoolIds(Long userId)
      Get all schools saved by a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      Returns:
      a response object containing id of all saved school.
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user with userId is not found
      See Also:
      • SavedSchoolResponse

    • addSavedSchool

      void addSavedSchool(Long userId, SavedSchoolRequest savedSchoolRequest)
      Add a school to user's saved schools.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      savedSchoolRequest - request object containing data required to add saved school
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user with userId is not found
      SchoolNotFoundException - if school to save is not found
      UserAlreadySaveSchoolException - if user already save school
      See Also:
      • SavedSchoolRequest

    • removeSavedSchool

      void removeSavedSchool(Long userId, SavedSchoolRequest savedSchoolRequest)
      Remove a school from user's saved schools.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user
      savedSchoolRequest - request object containing data required to remove saved school
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - if user with userId is not found
      UserNotSaveSchoolException - if school is not saved by user
      See Also:
      • SavedSchoolRequest
